ygData.subject: RE: [EQCheats] Digest Number 211
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually Chuck, not sure how long you have been playing the game, but people have been buying and selling eq items with real money for a long time, its not
ygData.messageBody:
Actually Chuck, not sure how long you have been playing the game, but people
have been buying and selling eq items with real money for a long time, its
not hard to do. As a matter of fact up until several months ago, you could
purchase in-game items on ebay all the time, I myself have never subscribe
to this type of method of gaining the items I want or need, however it
simple as and effective, and has been very lucrative in the past for
hardcore players, no scams just a bunch of game addicts who will do anything
to get ahead.

-----Original Message-----
From: Chuck [mailto:lancilot2000@...]
Sent: Saturday, October 13, 2001 1:04 PM
To: EQCheats@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Digest Number 211

If anyone even thinks about sending this guy 250 real dollars for
this stuff, then maybe you should be admitted. And the guy actually
posting this post, you must have rocks in your head to expect that
kind of money for some inanimate items in some game. Get real
pal, how about I just send you my paycheck every week, NOT.

Anyway, don't be stupid people and fall for scams like this, which is
all they are.

P.S. This is not a cheat, it is a scam and does not belong here. Maybe
you can't accept paypal cause you screwed too many people out of
their hard earned money and they kicked you off their service. Or could
be that it is almost impossible to get money back from someone if you
pay them by money order.

>________________________________________________________________________
>________________________________________________________________________
>
